Member Function Documentation

virtual bool ExperimentReport::close ( bool  abort  )  [inline, virtual]

ExperimentReport::close Synopsis:

Clean up memory, typically called in the destructor, but can be called for reuse of report object.

!!!! WARNING !!!! DO NOT USE Verbose:: if the 'abort' parameter is passed. The abort indicates that the Windows triggered an exception and the Verbose:: object gets comprised under these conditions. All Verbose:: actions must be conditional upon abort.

Parameters:
abort - see warning above. Consoole sent an abort.
Returns:
true - close happened ok.

Reimplemented in MarkerExperimentReport, RegressionExperimentReport, and TranslationExperimentReport.

virtual bool ExperimentReport::generate ( class RunTimeEnvironment &  rte,
class TranslationTableModel &  ttm,
std::map< std::string, class ExperimentResults * > &  er 
) [inline, virtual]

ExperimentReport::generate Synopsis: The report generation method to override.

This gets called once per experiment so as to stream output one experiment at a time.

Parameters:
rte - the single run time environment instance
ttm - the single translation table model
er - container for all CallResults for one experiment
Returns:

Reimplemented in MarkerExperimentReport, RegressionExperimentReport, and TranslationExperimentReport.

Definition at line 86 of file ExperimentReport.h.

virtual ExperimentReportTypeEnum ExperimentReport::report_type (  )  [inline, virtual]

ExperimentReport::report_type Synopsis:

Registering a new report requires adding an ENUM to the report type enum in this file. This method returns that ENUM specified.

Returns:
ExperimentReportTypeEnum - NULLREPORT by default.

Reimplemented in MarkerExperimentReport, RegressionExperimentReport, and TranslationExperimentReport.
